short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly manage tabs powered with AI summarizer

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TabMagic is your ultimate Chrome extension for a smarter browsing experience. Simplify how you handle tabs with powerful features designed to boost productivity and streamline your workflow.

Key Features:
Organize Tabs into Labeled Groups: Keep your tabs tidy and easy to access by categorizing them into custom, labeled groups.
Save Frequently Used Tabs: Save and quickly reopen your most-used tabs for seamless access whenever you need them.
Summarize Tab Content: Get concise key points of any web page at a glance, helping you save time and focus on what matters.
Chat with Tab Content: Ask questions and interact directly with the content of your tabs through an AI-powered chat feature.
Transform your browsing experience with TabMagic â€” the ultimate tool for organization, efficiency, and productivity!

For Key points and chat tab content, use your own API Key, right now we support OpenAI and Google Gemini

TabMagic currently on Early Access Preview and free for getting feedback
